attributes.review: the app keeps crashing and the navigation is really bad. i can’t keep it open for longer than a minute tops. also the content isn’t relatable at all. i’m having issues with the apps battery and data usage as well. it’s ridiculous and takes up way too much space considering how small and unimportant it is. i would give less than 1 star if i could. seriously, it’s that bad.
attributes.title: bad app

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what donald trumps plans were and it took up so much storage and made my phone slow i could barely run more than one app at a time even one app was horrible so i do not recommend this app thank you very much

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i love to support my racist, homophobic, pedophilic president, but i instantly started to feel a nasty clenching on my butthole as soon as i set my eyes on the orange cheeto like monstrosity that was on my screen😀. if i could give this app 0 stars, i would in a heartbeat. to top it off, this app sent mini gabbie hannas to my house, chanting “i climbed out of my head and watched myself implode a thought without a body ought to be the shot to take a load off my brain is poisoned and i’m searching for the antidote but every time i find it my defenses scream oh no you don’t w̸̟̄͗o̷̡̼̳͔̱̽ȩ̵̰̞̜̙̙̀̊̈́̀̓̆̈̇̃̀͐̕͘͘͝” absolutely horrible app😔🤚
attributes.title: gave me hemorrhoids😹😹

attributes.review: i wish i was kidding, but i’m not. ever since i got this app my entire phone has not only been lagging, but also freezing, and completely shutting down. either this is actual malware or this is wayyyy more than the measly 50 megabytes it claims to be in the description. i can see why so many people have rated it so low. as a LIFELONG TRUMP SUPPORTER, i really really wish he had found a way to make an app that was streamlined for easy use by fellow patriots and right wing republicans! i must say, Trump can do no wrong, but whoever designed this app deserves to be deported with all the illegal immigrants! God bless America! Trump 2020! tiktok is evil! please delete this app!! ✨
attributes.title: please delete this, i am bigot

attributes.review: Every time I go on my phone, a notification shows up like every two minutes. It’s SO ANNOYING. LIKE BRUH HOW DO I CALM THE NOTIFICATIONS DOWN?! I tried to turn off the notifications in the settings but it WASNT WORKING!!!!! So I have to just deal with it. Like man, just let me enjoy my YouTube and Netflix. So only thing left to do, was to delete it. I’m happy I deleted it. This APP IS THE WORST!!! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: DISRUPTING EVERYTHING!!! 😡😡😡
